item.desc: Worked out my timesheet for the 43rd week of 2009 and published the global timesheet on the website.

Published the first revision of the SPMP document. A DOAP metadata file was added for describing this document. In addition a separate URFM file was added to describe different the current and future releases of this document.
Published the 2009/10/23 meeting minutes on the website. In addition, performed cleanups on the repository and third-party installations.
Wrote an XSLT stylesheet to transform TimeTrack XML into HTML.
Extended SilkPage to process TimeTrack XML. Also re-organized the timesheets directory structure and added metadata for HTML versions of previously published timesheets.
Published the minutes for the 2009-10-30 meeting (due to Jonathan.)
Separated the metadata for publishing meeting minutes based on the year in which the meetings were held.
